Articles.Content:
Soo.... listening to the "Blue Danube" on repeat for an hour while playing Orbiter made the only thing I could think about be 2001...

Yeah... Anyway, I couldn't find any downloads for craft files after a Google search, so do you guys know any? Or if you've made some 2001: A Space Odessy crafts of your own, THEN PLEASE PUT THM UP FOR DOWNLOAD!!!!

Thanks in advance!

There was a 2001-based 'KSP movie' someone made, featuring a (heavily modded) version of the Discovery that looked pretty good.

As for stock crafts (or crafts that I actually have the files for) I couldn't say. Although there have been some pretty nice ring stations out there.

Didn't Rune make an Eagle-inspired dropship? Hold up, I'm going down the rabbit hole.

EDIT: Nope, didn't find anything, but I remember he was using it to build a Mun base. Guess we'll have to wait for him to show it off.

Edited August 27, 2014 by astropapi1
Thread moved to Ship Exchange, where people might be inclined to exchange their 2001-inspired ships.

Didn't Rune make an Eagle-inspired dropship? Hold up, I'm going down the rabbit hole.

EDIT: Nope, didn't find anything, but I remember he was using it to build a Mun base. Guess we'll have to wait for him to show it off.

Yup, but that is based on Space:1999 and not 2001. Here it is, BTW.

Rune. I guess now I have to do something, don't I?

Goodspeed has a Discovery command pod, but what *I* want is the antenna...I managed to create a similar three-dish arrangement using IR, but it kinda sucked. AAAnnnd, as it was a pre-.24 design, it won't load anymore

Yup, but that is based on Space:1999 and not 2001. Here it is, BTW.

Argh, I keep confusing both of them.

Rune. I guess now I have to do something, don't I?

Er. Mah. Gawd. Please do!

Rune. I guess now I have to do something, don't I?

Rune, 2 words: Do it.

Goodspeed Aerospace has quite a few parts you could use to build your own craft. In fact its a very versitle pack, it has not been updated for a while but it is just a parts pack so I don't see why it wouldn't work still. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/72567-0-23-5-Goodspeed-Aerospace-Parts-v2014-4-1B

I build the Discovery One, the Orion Clipper and the space station with stock parts (Okay, MechJeb is onboard, so I got problems when I'm nearing the Jool system ).

It was a little bit tricky to get these into orbit, but I managed it <proud-mode on >

The Discovery was an unmanned probe because I didn't find a satisfying solution for integrating the commandpods.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

But I'm very sorry, I don't have the craft-files anymore .

Edited August 27, 2014 by Sylith

I build the Discovery One, the Orion Clipper and the space station with stock parts (Okay, MechJeb is onboard, so I got problems when I'm nearing the Jool system http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_smiley.gif).

It was a little bit tricky to get these into orbit, but I managed it <proud-mode on http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_smiley.gif>

The Discovery was an unmanned probe because I didn't find a satisfying solution for integrating the commandpods.

http://imgur.com/a/OP0Cc

But I'm very sorry, I don't have the craft-files anymore http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/smilies/k_cry.gif.

WOW! Sylith these are amazing. Are they stock?
Those... Oh... My... God... It's a real shame that the craft files disappeared...

All the ships are stock, I only use MechJeb for the informations. Autoascend doesn't work with these ships.

I'm away for a week, maybe I can rebuild the Discovery after my return.

If I remember right the ship had nearly 900 parts with the launch pack and bounced and bumped like a crazy horse. It is real Kraken-fodder . I will look if can improve that.

The Orion-Shuttle had a problem with the center of weight so it was a exhausting trip to orbit cause it always tried to roll over. Therefore I deleted the ship after the photoshooting. If I redo her it will be after the release of 0.25 of KSP (Greatest game of the Universe - Kudos to Squad).

Sylith
Ah, can't wait! Just remember, do a FANTASTIC job!

Okay, I'm back and I have found something in my backup-files

I tweaked her a little bit and reworked the launchstage. The part-count is now 920 with the launchstage included.

And I added the MK2-Lander-cabin, so she has a crew of two Kerbals.

Launch the ship and begin the gravity-turn after the first stage is dropped.

Beware, she is very wobbly. I recommend the use of the Kerbal Joint Reinforcements-MOD,which is found here.

.craft-file via dropbox.com

Have fun,

Sylith

Outstanding Sylith

Here is my Orion I and III

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91823-2001-A-Space-Odyssey-Orion-II-Shuttle-and-Orion-I-Booster-v1-5-SP-mod-24

http://youtu.be/pa8DA4r5J0k

Edited September 6, 2014 by Space Cowboy
